thread.title: Puppy dies in overhead bin, United apologizes

title: Puppy dies in overhead bin, United apologizes
text:
Puppy dies in overhead bin, United apologizes 2:05pm EDT - 01:29 
United Airlines is apologizing after the death of a 10-month-old French bulldog in an overhead bin on one of its flights. As Linda So reports, a flight attendant allegedly forced the owners to put their dog in the bin. Linda So
